title: The arts of grandeur and submission, or, A discourse concerning the behaviour of great men towards their inferiours, and of inferiour personages towards men of greater quality written in Latin by Joannes Casa ... ; and rendered into English by Henry Stubbe ...
author: Della Casa, Giovanni, 1503-1556.
publicationDate: First printed in English, May Day, 1665
publisher: Printed by A.M. for William Lee ...,
notes: Translation of: De officiis inter potentiores et tenuiores amicos.
